pages.text: 'The Texas Chainsaw Massacre' and 'Saw' are popular movies that have sparked our imagination about chainsaws. You may find them scary or exciting, but now you have a chance to turn that imagination into reality. After all, zombies won't accuse you of committing murder! With an endless number of zombies, this killing

machine can not only saw through wood but also efficiently shred each zombie's head, turning them into a pile of flesh in just a few seconds. However, if you're a vegetarian, please have a barf bag ready. Also, gentlemen,
please note that the chainsaw's chain is quite fragile, so when dealing with tougher opponents, it's better to consider other options.

$(o)(There is a manual attached here)$()$(br)$(#6F6F6F)$(l)Golden Industries P65C Blaze-Rod Electric Chainsaw$()$(br)$(#6F6F6F)Product Specifications$(li)Power Source: Battery pack$(li)Battery Parameters: 2500mAh * 15$(li)Chain Material: Hard alloy$(li)Idle Battery Life: 720 minutes$(li)Weight: 2.5kg
